Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
Is my account on prepaid or postpaid payment

To check if your account is on prepaid or postpaid payment, you can access the Billing Section in your NewsBreak Ad Manager. If you see options to add ad credits, your account is likely on a prepaid plan. For postpaid (invoicing) options, you would typically need to contact your NewsBreak seller for more information. If you're unsure, feel free to reach out to adsupport@newsbreak.com for assistance.
